# kryptand-translate



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                     | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `name`   | `name`    | The key you set in your translation file. {    "hello":"Hallo Welt" }           | `string` | `undefined` |
| `value`  | `value`   | The value you want to insert into your string. {    "hello":"Hallo {{value}}" } | `any`    | `undefined` |
